Name: Black cotton: Wuneng
About the game: About the game: This is a role-playing ARPG game. The player will play Pig Bajie. The background of the plot is that Bai Gujing ate Tang Sanzang, and his skill increased greatly. Sun Wukong was killed alive. Pig Bajie seeks to revive his master and elder martial brother. The plot is rich and interesting, and his brain is wide open, which overturns your understanding of the traditional Western Journey. Game features: Combat system: support unarmed combat, melee weapons, long-range weapons, spell spells Construction system: you can create a warm home Planting system: planting various crops Trading system: you can trade with merchants on the mountain, and you can buy weapon spells from them Role: personas with high-precision modeling, various realistic modeling Plants: high-precision plants, realistic nature Future update direction: plot, various weapons, more buildings and riding systems that will continue to be updated in the future. You can get faster help by posting messages in the community, and you can also put forward suggestions to help us improve and update better
